body_html:
By the way, the errors are related to including MKL DNN header files

 30 #include "mkl_dnn.h"
 31 #include "mkl_dnn_types.h"

Where their "include" folder is located/external/mkl_dnn/include/, not closely tied to the tensorflow root folder.

Where their "include" folder is located/external/mkl_dnn/include/, not closely tied to the tensorflow root folder.
body:
By the way, the errors are related to including MKL DNN header files

     30 #include "mkl_dnn.h"
     31 #include "mkl_dnn_types.h"

Where their "include" folder is located<build output folder>/external/mkl_dnn/include/, not closely tied to the tensorflow root folder.
